com.googlecode.transloader.clone.reflect
Interface CloningDecisionStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
MaximalCloningDecisionStrategy, MinimalCloningDecisionStrategy
public interface CloningDecisionStrategy

A strategy interface for customising which parts of an object graph ReflectionCloningStrategy should actually clone.

Author:
Jeremy Wales

Method Summary
 boolean shouldCloneObjectContent(Object original, ClassLoader targetClassLoader)
          Determines whether the objects referenced by the given object should themselves be considered for cloning.
 boolean shouldCloneObjectItself(Object original, ClassLoader targetClassLoader)
          Determines whether the given object (not considering any objects it references) should be shallow copied.
 

Method Detail

shouldCloneObjectItself

boolean shouldCloneObjectItself(Object original,
                                ClassLoader targetClassLoader)
                                throws ClassNotFoundException
Determines whether the given object (not considering any objects it references) should be shallow copied.

Parameters:
original - the candidate for cloning
targetClassLoader - the ClassLoader with which it may be cloned with
Returns:
true if the original should be shallow cloned
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - if the targetClassLoader cannot be used to clone the original because it cannot find a required Class

shouldCloneObjectContent

boolean shouldCloneObjectContent(Object original,
                                 ClassLoader targetClassLoader)
                                 throws ClassNotFoundException
Determines whether the objects referenced by the given object should themselves be considered for cloning.

Parameters:
original - the object referencing potential candidates for cloning
targetClassLoader - the ClassLoader with which the objects referenced by original may be cloned
Returns:
true if the objects referenced by original should themselves be considered for cloning
Throws:
ClassNotFoundException - if the targetClassLoader cannot be used to clone the objects refernced by original because it cannot find a required Class
